title: ARAM upvote if you like the idea :)
body: how many people would be more inclined to play and enjoy aram more if you could get any champion not just ones available to you now?

replies.body:
Personally I would hate that. There are champs I don't have for a reason.  I don't like them, not just cause ARAM but because I don't find the champion fun at all. I've actually had champs relocked for that reason because I got tired of getting them in ARAM. 

They are good champions I just didn't like them at all :/

Yes this is true. I **quite disliked** Ryze the first time that I played him. _**However**_, the next time I played him I enjoyed it a lot! **(this was before the rework mind you)**. Anyway I think that taking that into consideration, **wouldn't being forced to play someone you didn't like or didn't have any experience with be a positive learning experience???**

Just my opinion anyway.

P.S. I agree with you and also the creator of this thread at the same time. You have a valid argument.
i like aram,but i dont play it in taric's free week....thnx you,but nope,not interested,dont want

How does this idea:
A: Help Riot sell more champions
B: Solve ARAM champion balance
or
C: Promote Competitive play

A : It's well known that most people don't know that they want something until they get it. You'd be surprised how much people are able to discover kits they didn't even know they like in things like one for all. I personally didn't know that Diana was this fun to play. And people are not necessarily willing to try people during free weeks due to the fear of being stomped.

B : It doesn't. Then again what actually would help with that ? Nothing.

C : kek
